mapper.select: select qna_number, qna_title, qna_content, qna_read_count, qna_writeday, m.member_number, member_nickname from `member` m join qna q on m.member_number = q.member_number order by qna_number desc limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}
mapper.insert: insert into qna_comment (commentent_number, commentent_content, member_number, qna_number) values(#{commententNumber}, #{commententContent},#{memberNumber},#{qnaNumber})
